content.rendered:
TTE Products & Solutions was invited to be part of a townhall organized by Danfoss in their Jebel Ali Headquarters in which Ziad Al Bawaliz, Regional President, Danfoss TMA presented Dilip Sharma, Executive VP of TTE with the ‘Most Progressive Partner’ award. TTE has been the partner of Danfoss since 1989 for Refrigeration & Air Conditioning Controls and Compressors, and Drives (VFDs) in UAE. Over the years the partnership has strengthened and TTE has grown from being a distribution partner to a solutions provider.

Also present in the townhall were Roshan Samuel, VP, TTE Products & Solutions, Nikhil Mohan, Sales Manager, TTE, Nauman Merchant, Sales Engineer and from Danfoss were Jai Masand, Sales Director- Industry Business Unit, Youssef Zitouni, Head of Channel Sales- Danfoss MENA region, Amal Vijayan, Key Account Manager, Danfoss – MENA Region and Sohaib Sulaiman, Area Sales Manager. The discussions at the townhall revolved around the joint commitment of Danfoss and TTE of delivering top-notch solutions to the UAE and beyond.
